TopicTitle: I am developing more organic parts!

Articles.Content:
And this time I chose red!

Thing (utility to be decided soon):

http://imgur.com/gallery/FM8kmJ0

Science device:

http://imgur.com/VoA8Dsn

Thoughts? I just started 15 minutes ago so I may change stuff. Also, feel free to post suggestions!

Very Cool, does it refuel by eating Kerbals?

I'm thinking some kind of photosynthesis for fuel and electricity?

Maybe a powerful Ion drive for it.

Edited April 18, 2014 by Tommygun
Fuel and electricity will generate slowly over time, with a bit of a reserve. As for the engine, I don't know.
I hope you make those tentacles on the science thing move passively. That would be so cool.
The parts look really cool. Suggestion: make the color tweakable
Looks cool but not my cup of tea. The first looks like a head, command pod, to me.
